subject: Eugene PD x Flock - procurement next steps
body:
You don't often get email from caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com. Learn why this is important <https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification>  
	

[EXTERNAL ?]

Hi Capt Burke and Tim,

Thanks again for the time today. I am glad we are aligned on the rest of the procurement process.

To summarize, here are everyone's homework assignments:

Tim - Tim to send Caroline the City's standard T&C for review. Caroline and Tim to work through the legal review process with Flocks legal and Eugene's CA.

Captain Burke - Capt Burke to confirm with Chief if council approval is needed -  if so, ideally 2/24, 3/10, or 3/24 council date to get on agenda. Introduce Caroline to IT to confirm they have all necessary documents/questions answered. 

Caroline- 
I have attached Flock's legal documents for your attorney's review:

*	Order Form Exhibit A. This document outlines the products, payment terms, subscription term length, etc. This is the doc that will eventually be signed. We will update the term length and # of products as Caroline and Capt Burke finalize the deployment map.
*	Exhibit B- Master Services Agreement (MSA). This is terms and conditions that will need to be approved by your attorney. Flock's legal team is easy to work with on comments/redlines, but they do request that all comments are made via Microsoft Word Track Changes.
*	Exhibit C - Customer Implementation Guide. This is the guide to installation, no review of signatures needed on this

Thank you again! Please don't hesitate to give me a shout at any time. 
	
 https://sales.flocksafety.com/t/102869/sc/c5ffb8fb-ac20-4583-9173--com 	 
Caroline Fraher
Territory Sales Manager

 https://sales.flocksafety.com/t/102869/sc/c5ffb8fb-ac20-4583-9173-bb8c7aedcb29/NB2HI4DTHIXS653XO4XGY2LONNSWI2LOFZRW63JPMNXW24DBNZ4S6ZTMN5RWWLLTMFTGK5DZ/HFQWIMRQGQ4WIODDGFTDSM3EHFRDAYRXGEYWEMBUMRSDQNJWHA4TANJZGAYGEY3C/www-linkedin-com-company-flock-safety

 https://sales.flocksafety.com/t/102869/sc/c5ffb8fb-ac20-4583-9173-bb8c7aedcb29/NB2HI4DTHIXS653XO4XGMYLDMVRG633LFZRW63JPMZWG6Y3LONQWMZLUPE======/MZRWCNBYGE4DSYZXGY3TIMBUG43GMZJZGJSWMYLDMFRTMZBSME2TGNBSGRRTGNRZ/www-facebook-com-flocksafety 

 https://sales.flocksafety.com/t/102869/sc/c5ffb8fb-ac20-4583-9173-bb8c7aedcb29/NB2HI4DTHIXS653XO4XHS33VOR2WEZJOMNXW2L3DF5DGY33DNNJWCZTFOR4Q====/GUYWIZBZMVRWMNBSGQ3WGMJZGZTDAZRUG5TDGNTFGMYDMNZXG5SGGNZYHAYTINBT/www-youtube-com-c-flocksafety

 <https://cdn.gifo.wisestamp.com/s/rfcustom/108062/26/trans.png>  caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com
